Reviews.Title: vacation here we come
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Spiewak
Reviews.Content: Love the underwater digital camera idea.  Bought the throw-a-ways but getting hard to find a place to develop.  Took a few pictures and can't wait til vacation to use it.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: J 27
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for my families needs. Takes good moving pictures. The total package is nice but have not used 90 percent of it yet. All products showed up and functioned properly.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with this
Reviews.Author: Lena
Reviews.Content: This was bought for my daughter. She is very clumsy. It has been dropped multiple times and still works great. She has even won some awards from the photos that she has taken with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Luke Brett Berube
Reviews.Content: This has turned out to be a great, rugged, and durable camera with excellent optics.  Takes a little getting use to all the settings but it does a fantastic job.  Very pleased with it.  It's a great set.

Reviews.Title: Good kit!
Reviews.Author: Bruna
Reviews.Content: Fair price, beautiful color, excellent camera and excellent kit. I strongly recommend it. It also arrived on time for my trip.

Reviews.Title: low light king for video
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "sharienne2"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our son last year. I was blown away when he got clear video in a gym with only emergency lights on. We love the pics, too. But... when he left it in the swimming pool for a week (he's nine.... sigh...) it stopped working even after we dried the outside and then dried the inside and then switched batteries.

Reviews.Title: It's a point and shoot - what do you expect?
Reviews.Author: S. M. Korby "smkorby"
Reviews.Content: It takes a steady hand to get a good picture. Just the shake from pushing the shutter is enough to ruin a photo. Doesn't work well in anything less than bright light. Color is good, but not the quality I am used to with a Canon Rebel.On the up side, the video works great. Surprisingly good quality video and sound. We got this camera because it works under water and got some great under water video. The photos were too shaky in the water to turn out. In the future we will continue to use the camera for the video feature, but not for the photos unless it just isn't feasible to carry around a larger camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon AW100 -with GPS, shockproof and waterproof...great point n shoot cam for any season
Reviews.Author: jeffcons
Reviews.Content: Got my Nikon AW 100 last year b4 my Tough Mudder event delivered at the right time and date when i needed it. Tis camera works great on any day,  hot or very cold temperatures. Just make sure to put a protection on the view screen especially if yur using it for extreme activities...The waterproof system works great for pool parties, wkend beach gigs and beer spill proof on concerts...the most awesome thing about the my camera is the full HD system that has almost perfect 1080p quality viewing. Connect it to yur big screen TV or upload it to youtube, facebook or any other purposes  then u will knw wut am taking about...After my tough mudder event it survived the  ice cold temp. 40-20degrees  with all the 10mile race with 25 obstacle courses banged, dropped ,bounced my cam 4-6 hrs total race time. Salute to Nikon...Highly recommended to anyone coz u will save money if u have tis gadget 100% will last 4eva...14mega pixel awesome quality PIX...buy the package offer coz that will save ya bit of moolaaa as well...
